name: gladiatorial combat
mods: +3 {hitForm} dmg while holding a shield OR +1 crit dice while holding a shield

name: strike leader
mods: +5' wep reach while holding a shield

name: powerful ward
mods: on block, 20% chance to gain -1 crit req for combat
while crit req is 17 or lower, +1 spell AC

name: enduring ward
mods: on block, 20% chance to gain +1 dmg res for combat
while dmg res is 3 or higher, +1 wep AC

name: precise retaliation
mods: if you've blocked since your last turn, +1 crit dice
if you haven't blocked since your last turn, -1 crit req

name: deep cuts
mods: 20% chance on wep hit to give -1 {physType} res for combat

name: force multiplier
mods: 20% chance on hit to deal double dmg

name: vicious skewering
mods: +2 mark effectiveness on targets afflicted by DoTs
20% chance on wep hit to give -1 {physType} res for combat
20% chance on wep hit to give 1 {physType} DoT until CON save

name: grim oath
mods: whenever you deal {physType} dmg, deal +1d4 {nonPhysType} dmg

name: replenishing presence
mods: you and adj allies have +1 passive regen

name: master of command
mods: 20% chance to refund resources spend on buffs

name: purposeful harbinger
mods: +1 buff effectiveness for each buff on you, up to 3

name: precise commander
mods: you and adj allies have -1 crit req
you and adj allies have +1 crit dice

name: pressure points
mods: 20% chance on crit to deal double dmg

name: overwhelming malice
mods: on crit, 20% chance to add 1d6 {nonPhysType} dmg to all {physType} dmg until end of your next turn

name: savage response
mods: if you've taken dmg since your last turn, +1 crit dice

name: eye of the storm
mods: +1 DoT dmg vs targets you've critted since start of your last turn
+1 to condi DCs vs targets you've critted since start of your last turn

name: quick getaway
mods: if you've crit since start of your last turn, +5' sp

name: assert dominance
mods: on KB, +15' AoE sizes until end of your next turn

name: vast power
mods: +5' AoE sizes per crit req below 20, up to +15'

name: powerful assault
mods: 30% chance on AoE hit to push target 10' away from AoE source

name: intensity
mods: dmging spells that can be re-triggered during the same cast gain +1 dmg each trigger

name: titanic swings
mods: +5' AoE sizes while holding a {weaponHands} wep
+1 AoE dmg while holding a {weaponHands} wep

name: ancestral echo
mods: if you've summoned a minion since start of your last turn, +2 global dmg

name: ancestral reach
mods: minion summoning powers have double range

name: ancestral might
mods: if you haven't summoned a minion this turn, +1 minion dmg

name: snaring spirits
mods: on minion summon, all foes adj to minion are slowed until end of your next turn

name: sleepless sentries
mods: if you've summoned a minion since start of your last turn, +1 global dmg and +5' sp

name: ancestral guidance
mods: your minions cannot have their sp reduced

name: ancestral inspiration
mods: if you've summoned a minion since start of your last turn, +4 spell dmg

name: vital focus
mods: +2 dmg with effects you're concentrating on

name: rapid infusion
mods: if you've ended concentration since start of your last turn, +5' sp and +1 {nonPhysType} dmg

name: unwavering focus
mods: +1 dmg with effects you're concentrating on
20% chance to refund resources spent on conc powers

name: enduring focus
mods: +3 dmg with effects you're concentrating on
on turn start while concentrating, 20% chance to gain +1 dmg res for combat

name: precise focus
mods: +1 crit dice if you started your turn concentrating

name: stoic focus
mods: +1 dmg with effects you're concentrating on

name: hex breaker
mods: on turn start while concentrating, remove a curse from yourself

name: arcane adept
mods: +3 dmg with effects you're concentrating on
if you started your turn concentrating, +1 spell dmg

name: mob mentality
mods: on buff use, 20% chance to gain +1 dmg res, +1 global dmg, or -1 crit req for combat

name: haunting shout
mods: creatures debuffed by you are frightened

name: lead by example
mods: on buff use, you and nearby allies gain +1 global dmg and +5' sp until end of your next turn

name: warning call
mods: on buff use, +3 {physType} res for combat

name: rattling bellow
mods: while buffed, weapon hits have 20% chance to deal double dmg

name: bloodscent
mods: on 1st {weaponClass} hit each turn, gain +1 wep dmg and +5' sp for combat

name: run through
mods: on {weaponClass} hit, 20% chance to give target -1 base dmg res for combat

name: overlord
mods: on hit with {weaponClass} weps, +1 dmg res until end of your next turn

name: expansive might
mods: for each turn you spend not moving, until you move, +5' AoE sizes

name: weight advantage
mods: on {weaponClass} hit, 20% chance to deal double dmg

name: wind-up
mods: on non-crit hit with {weaponClass} weps, 20% chance to gain -1 crit req for combat

name: disease vector
mods: creatures with your DoTs cannot be healed

name: arcing shot
mods: projs deal +1 dmg vs targets 60'+ away
projs have -2 crit req vs targets 60'+ away

name: tempered arrowheads
mods: while holding a {weaponClass}, +1 DoT dmg and your buffs and DoTs last double duration

name: explosive force
mods: on {weaponClass} KB, 20% chance for corpse to explode, dealing 10% of its max HP as {nonPhysType} to foes within 5' of it

name: opportunistic fusilade
mods: if you've crit since start of your last turn, +1 dmg with {weaponClass} weps

name: battlefield dominator
mods: if you've inflicted a condi while holding a {weaponHands} wep since start of your last turn, +5' AoE sizes

name: surefooted striker
mods: if you've crit with a {weaponHands} wep since start of your last turn, 20% chance on hit to deal double dmg

name: fearsome warrior
mods: on {rangeType} KB, 20% chance to frighten adj foes until end of your next turn

name: combat rhythm
mods: if you've hit with onhand wep since start of your last turn, +1 wep dmg
if you've hit with offhand wep since start of your last turn, +5' sp

name: hit and run
mods: if you've hit since start of your last turn, +1 to {abilityScore} saves

name: insatiable killer
mods: on KB while dual-wielding, 20% chance to gain +1 global dmg for combat

name: mage bane
mods: +1 wep dmg and +1 spell AC while dual-wielding
on block, 20% chance to gain -1 crit req for combat

name: martial momentum
mods: +1 wep dmg and +1 wep AB while dual-wielding
if you've teleported since start of your last turn, +1 global dmg

name: deadly repartee
mods: +1 wep dmg, +1 wep AC, and -1 wep crit req while dual-wielding

name: quick and deadly
mods: while wielding multiple weapon classes, +3 wep dmg

name: smite the weak
mods: on wep hit, 40% chance to slow until end of your next turn

name: heavy hitter
mods: on inflict condi, 20% chance to double its duration
